alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT AND COLLETON COUNTIES... At 727 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Dale to 6 miles northeast of Ladys Island to Port Royal, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Beaufort, Port Royal, Bennetts Point, Shell Point, Ladys Island, Parris Island, and Burton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
